attributes.action: Allow British Farmers to make use of Mobile Slaughterman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, if you use a mobile slaughterman for a home slaughter, you are not allowed to sell the meat on or feed it to friends. This goes against a tradition of humane slaughter and of practical methods for the smallholder. We should be allowed the ability to make use of these older traditions.
